whatsNewLinks.title: Power Virtual Agents and Composer integration preview
whatsNewLinks.description: We are pleased to announce the Public Preview of Power Virtual Agents integration with Microsoft Bot Framework Composer. Bot makers will now be able to use Bot Framework Composer to create custom content and add it to Power Virtual Agents.
